TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(IIF(NOT ISNULL(VALORE_in),VALORE_in,0) = CONTROLLO, 0, IIF(NOT ISNULL(VALORE_in),VALORE_in,0) - CONTROLLO)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: DELTA
